scripts.db:create: CAH_DB_USER="$CAH_DB_ROOT_USER" CAH_DB_PASSWORD="$CAH_DB_ROOT_PASSWORD" yarn sequelize db:create --config src/config.js
scripts.db:drop: CAH_DB_USER="$CAH_DB_ROOT_USER" CAH_DB_PASSWORD="$CAH_DB_ROOT_PASSWORD" yarn sequelize db:drop --config src/config.js
scripts.db:reset: yarn db:drop; yarn db:create && yarn db:migrate && yarn db:seed
scripts.db:truncate: for t in answer gameturn game player question choice; do echo "TRUNCATE TABLE $t CASCADE;"; done | psql -U $CAH_DB_USER -h $CAH_DB_HOST $CAH_DB_NAME
